amendment.description: Amendment defers an additional $22 million of prior year clean coal technology funding.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the amount of the deferral for Clean Coal Technology by $22 million from $67,000,000 to $89,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 207 - 204 (Roll no. 283).
